about_the_game:
RPG Maker official material collection is now available.

This collection includes materials of fantasy single pictures suitable for RPGs.
The time difference data is also included for the day, the evening, the night, and the night lighted version (if there is lighting scene, etc.).
Please utilize this collection for making your adventure game production.

*******************************************
Including pictures：72 materials x 2 sizes（816 pixels×624 pixels、1280 pixels x 720 pixels）
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
